pages.text:
FAMILY OWNED & OPERATED
Fellow campers that welcome you and make you feel at home, satisfied customers that return year after year, constant improvement in the facilities, a friendly and helpful staff that will go out of their way to make your stay a pleasant and relaxing one, attention to detail, good friends and good times… all of these things and more make Recreation Plantation RV Resort a truly unique haven for those that want a place they are proud to call home. We’re busting with pride!
OUR STORY
In 1984, Grant Gore began his research, planning and development of the Recreation Plantation RV Resort. He saw a need for an RV Park with first rate facilities, yet still in a quiet county setting. After inspecting the finest RV Parks in the country, he integrated the best ideas into Recreation Plantation.
Grant personally invites you to make Recreation Plantation your “Home Away From Home”. Grant and his family live in the Resort and oversees the day to day operations.
WHAT THEY SAY...
The Free High Speed Internet to every lot set this campground apart from other we have visited! BRAVO!
Oh what a fantastic RV Park. Lots to do and all the folks are friendly.
Bob F
Good location to visit the villages. Very accessible to stores, restaurants, and activities in the area. Lots of activities at the campground including a pool, horseshoes, shuffleboard, pickle ball, and tennis.
Jim F
